scripts.text:
MERGE INTO CHINOOK_DB.DW.ARTIST_DIM AS target
USING (
    SELECT 
        artistid,
        name,
        'CHINOOK' AS source_id,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY artistid) + 
        COALESCE((SELECT MAX(ARTIST_KEY) FROM CHINOOK_DB.DW.ARTIST_DIM), 0) AS new_key
    FROM CHINOOK_DB.STAGE.ARTIST
) AS source
ON target.ARTIST_ID = source.artistid

WHEN MATCHED AND (
    COALESCE(target.ARTIST_NAME, '') <> COALESCE(source.name, '')
) THEN
    UPDATE SET
        target.ARTIST_NAME = source.name,
        target.DATE_TO_WAREHOUSE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()

WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        ARTIST_KEY,
        ARTIST_ID,
        ARTIST_NAME,
        SOURCE_ID,
        DATE_TO_WAREHOUSE
    )
    VALUES (
        source.new_key,
        source.artistid,
        source.name,
        source.source_id,
        CURRENT_TIMESTAMP()
    );
